document_data.mainbody:
haleen Zoraz was a civic official who helped maintain the sewer system in the city of Baldurs Gate during the late 15 century DR.
As part of her duty to best serve Baldurs Gate and its citizens, Shaleen began a project that would extend the reach of the citys sewers.
Circa the , Shaleens plans drew the ire of Duke Thalamra Vanthampur. Unbeknownst to Shaleen, the expanded sewer system would extend beneath the Vanthampur Villa into the dukes secret dungeon of the Dead Three.
To stymie the expansion of the sewers, Duke Vanthampur imprisoned Shaleen within her villa, and had her tortured by a cadre of fiendish imps.
